item.title: MacOS Catalina GDB Setup
item.description: 1Install GDB:gdb: 2Cerfificate 3Codesign 4Change default GDB bin 5Create .gdbinit 6References The Codesigned: (please check gdb is codesigned - see taskgated(8)) 1Install GDB brew install gdb 2Cerfificate -> Keychain access -> Certificate assistance -> Create a certificate Name: gdb Identity Type: Self Signed Root Certificate Type: Code Signing Let me override defaults -> continue -> until “Specify a Location for Certificate”
